target.name: New annotation
target.query: select text, test_id from events where "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/ AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Relevant only for the whole test period
panels.title: Total drops, bytes
Max Trex TX Queue length, packets
Client TCP sessions state per second
Server TCP sessions state per second
Client UDP sessions state per second
Server UDP sessions state per second

targets.query: SELECT "profile_name", "profile_path", "profile_client_udps_keepdrops" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/ AND "profile" != 'main_profile') AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Trex host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "test_id" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
list.label: test id
list.name: test_id
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "test_id" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
